price: 10. La fin de ceux qui commettaient les mauvaises œuvres fut bien mauvaise, car ils traitaient de mensonges les versets d’Allah et les tournaient en dérision.
arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ ٱلسُّوٓأَىٰٓ أَن كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَانُواْ بِهَا يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma kāna ʿāqibata alladhīna asāū al-sūā an kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi wakānū bihā yastahziūna
